ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Clients', ( ISBLANK(FirstName) || ISBLANK(LastName) || ISBLANK(MailingCity) || ISBLANK(MailingPostalCode) || ISBLANK(MailingStreet) || ISBLANK(Email) || OR ( AND ( ISBLANK(MobilePhone), ISPICKVAL(npe01__PreferredPhone__c, 'Mobile') ), AND ( ISBLANK(HomePhone), ISPICKVAL(npe01__PreferredPhone__c, 'Home') ) ) ), NOT($Permission.Override_Client_Validation) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please review the client. Full name, full address, email and preferred phone are required.
